description:
Following the release of The Room on Nintendo Switch, Fireproof Games are pleased to bring its award winning sequel to the eShop.

Now rebuilt and remastered for Nintendo Switch, The Room Two continues the time-spanning journey of its famous predecessor by significantly expanding its unique puzzle-and-explore gameplay. Follow a trail of cryptic letters from an enigmatic scientist known only as “AS” into a compelling world of tactile inspection and challenging mystery.

Key Features

Captivating Puzzles: Easy to start, yet hard to put down, The Room Two presents a compelling mix of intriguing puzzles which will take you on a journey of myth and machinery. Discover hidden messages, decipher codes and unlock sophisticated mechanisms with the help of an ornate eyepiece which reveals the unseen.

Entrancing Artwork: Featuring a multitude of intricately detailed objects to discover within a variety of stunning environments, The Room Two offers new ways to challenge your puzzle solving skills.

Compelling Story: Curious letters from an old friend will draw you deeper into the mysteries of The Room Two, letters which somehow seem to span time and space. The cryptic path ahead awaits, interwoven with secrets, deception and peril.

Optimized for Nintendo Switch: Explore The Room Two using either the touch screen or Joy-Con motion controls for a tactile experience so natural you can almost feel the turn of each key and the click of every lock. The combination of innovative mechanics and interactive controls create a memorizing experience from beginning to end.
name: The Room Two
